message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
Let's be fair, Alice. This split accounts for the time value of money.
Bob, my turn to propose a fair deal.  I'll take $55, you get $45. Time is running out, and the money is shrinking!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
